Intervention: Four 250 mg tablets per day 5-14 days before surgery
American Ginseng root: four, 250 mg tablets per day 5-14 days before surgery
Eligibility: Incorporation criteria:
Patients with cytologically confirmed breast cancer with invasive or non-invasive biopsy (CISD) of at least 1.0 cm maximum diameter on imaging
Surgical patients subject to mastectomy, subtotal or total
- 18 years or older
Women
• Tissue block available from diagnostic biopsy
Negative pregnancy test, medical history of surgical sterilization, or 1 year after menopause
You must be prepared to give up surgery for at least 5 days.
Capacity and willingness to sign written consent
In case of hypertensive, at a stable dose at least 30 days
In case of diabetes, well controlled (HbA1C < 8.5 in the last 60 days or documented GPF < 140 mg/dl for 3 consecutive days)
ECOG status < 2 or Karnofsky of 60 % or more
- Exclusion criteria:
Previous or present malignancy, excluding non-melanomic skin cancer
Evidence of distant metastatic disease
History of chemotherapy, biology or radiotherapy with 6 months of biopsy
The use of herbal supplements or substitute drugs not approved by the FDA within one week of the start of the study.
History of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of chemical or biological composition similar to LEAG
The history of chronic inflammatory processes, including, but not limited to, rheumatoid arthritis and lupus.
• Active haemorrhage or a pathological condition that presents a high risk of bleeding
Any malfunction of ingestion
• Uncontrolled intercurrent disease
(indicated with HbA1c < 8.5 in the last 60 days or documented fasting blood glucose < 140 mg/dl for three consecutive days)
Known diabetics who have experienced episodes of symptomatic hypoglycaemia in the last 6 months are also considered to be poorly controlled and will be excluded from participation in the study.
Uncontrolled hypertension (SBP > 140 mmHg or DBP > 90 mmHG)
• Pregnant or lactating women Women should be willing to use contraception throughout the study.
Current experimental drugs or treatment with an experimental agent within 6 weeks of biopsy
Current treatment with coumadine or coumadine in the 2 weeks prior to biopsy
Current treatment of monoamine oxidase inhibitors
Results: Change in initial value at the end of treatment with LEAG.
Title of the arm/group: American ginseng root
Description of the arm/group: four 250mg tablets per day 5-14 days before surgery
American Ginseng root: four, 250 mg tablets per day 5-14 days before surgery
